page.title: 04VILLAGE SERVICES.
page.content: { {POST OFFICE.}A small Post Office operates from within a private house on the Common. {VILLAGE SCHOOL.}This very old school still caters for the educational needs of the 5 to 11 year old children from quite a wide catchment area.Numbers on roll have dropped over the last few years to between 50 and 60 pupils.At 11years of age pupils move to the Chantry High School,Martley(6 miles away). {VILLAGE CHURCHES.} {ST.MICHAEL'S.}Stands in the old village (next to the Rectory).Although very little of it is standing today,a few weekly services are still held there.Often local families prefer to have weddings and christenings in this delightful old building with its long history.
